scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.scrape: cd server && cd seeds && cd scraper && node breedScrape.js
scripts.seed: concurrently "cd server && cd seeds && cd scraper && node breedScrape.js" cd server && cd seeds && cd utils && node seed.js
